title: Is listening to music 16 hours a day bad? - Quora

response.answer_text: Some of you with these ridiculous questions….. It’s very simple, if it interferes with other obligations you have then yes, it is bad. If it does nothing but adds melody to your day then no. You decide here buddy, this is not some “Quora will tell me” type of question.

Naah, just worse if earphones are ON for 16 hours a day. And If you play it on speaker for 16 hours a day and it drags you to your fantasies and makes overthink about something, BRACE YOURSELF - your heart and brain are at unrest, they need some me-time. Better to pull your string now before you hit 24 hours a day.
